channel.title: [508] {help} [508]
channel.description:
Hey, I was trying to run my 508 server, and I ended up with this error when I ran it.
[code]java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:359) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:40) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:60) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Does anyone have any idea on how to fix this? Thanks in advance!

item.title: [508] {help} [508]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Yeah, I know.
Just didnâ€™t know what error meant.

item.title: [508] {help} [508]

item.description:
@i_like_rsps wrote:

if you want 2 servers up to run 508 and 317

go server.java make port 5555 that way if you post that server on mopar with 508 client you get people on your 508
